Headline: #54 Cicero Temporary Reroute at Cicero/Washington
ShortDescription: #54 Cicero buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Cicero, Chicago, Laramie, Madison and Cicero, due to street blockage near Cicero/Washington.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?

#54 Cicero buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Cicero, Chicago, Laramie, Madison, then resume their normal route on Cicero, due to street blockage near Cicero/Washington.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Delays Affecting O'Hare-bound Blue Line Trains
ShortDescription: O'Hare-bound Blue Line trains are running w/delays from congestion after earlier signal problems nr the areas of Damen. Crews working to restore normal service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
O'Hare-bound Blue Line trains are running with delays from congestion after earlier signal problems near the areas of Damen.

Some trains and platforms may be busier than usual as crews work to restore normal service.

Crews are working to clear the congestion that's formed/correct the problem and restore normal travel times through the area.

Allow extra travel time.
